TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Log extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供屬性和方法，用於將事件和例外狀況 (Exception) 資訊寫入應用程式的記錄檔接聽程式。

span.span: Provides a property and methods for writing event and exception information to the application's log listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.Log`物件提供直接的進入點從中存取[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]的記錄服務。The `My.Application.Log` object provides a straightforward entry point from which to access the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]'s logging services. `WriteEntry`和`WriteException`方法會將訊息寫入應用程式的記錄檔接聽程式。The `WriteEntry` and `WriteException` methods write messages to the application's log listeners. 接聽程式可以由應用程式的組態檔設定。The listeners can be configured by the application's configuration file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更位置 My.Application.Log 寫入資訊](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)和[使用應用程式記錄檔](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Changing Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md) and [Working with Application Logs](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md). `My.Application.Log`物件是僅供用戶端應用程式。The `My.Application.Log` object is available only for client applications. Web 應用程式，使用`My.Log`。For Web applications, use `My.Log`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Application.Log`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Application.Log` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |事件資訊寫入至應用程式的記錄檔接聽程式Write event information to the application's log listeners|[如何：寫入記錄檔訊息How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)| |例外狀況資訊寫入應用程式的記錄檔接聽程式Write exception information to the application's log listeners|[如何：記錄例外狀況How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)| |決定在何處`My.Application.Log`將資訊寫入Determine where `My.Application.Log` writes information|[逐步解說：判斷 My.Application.Log 寫入資訊的位置Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)| ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用 `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` 方法寫入追蹤資訊。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` method to log tracing information. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 寫入記錄檔訊息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)。For more information, see [How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 取得位在 物件之下的 物件的檔案。

span.span: Gets the file the object that underlies the object.

value.span: 傳回位在 物件之下的 物件。

span.span: Returns the object that underlies the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷目前的組態物件。You can use this property to determine the current configuration of the object. 在用戶端應用程式，`Log`物件是透過`My.Application.Log`物件。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 應用程式，`Log`物件是透過`My.Log`物件。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object.

permission.span: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
Associated enumeration: .

.method familyorassemblynewslot virtual instance void InitializeWithDefaultsSinceNoConfigExists() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub InitializeWithDefaultsSinceNoConfigExists ()
protected public: virtual void InitializeWithDefaultsSinceNoConfigExists();

summary.span: 建立新的 物件，並將其加入至 集合。

span.span: Creates a new object and adds it to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立新，將其名稱設定為`FileLog`，並將它設定為記錄訊息嚴重性層級和更新版本。This method creates a new , sets its name to `FileLog`, and configures it to log messages with severity level and greater. 新物件接著會新增至集合。The new object is then added to the collection. 呼叫的方法，如果屬性尚未設定。The calls the method if the property has not been configured. 可以在應用程式的組態檔中設定追蹤來源。The trace source can be configured in the application's configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.TraceSource TraceSource { get; }
.property instance class System.Diagnostics.TraceSource TraceSource
Public ReadOnly Property TraceSource As TraceSource
public: property System::Diagnostics::TraceSource ^ TraceSource { System::Diagnostics::TraceSource ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得位在 物件之下的 物件。

span.span: Gets to the object that underlies the object.

value.span: 傳回位在 物件之下的 物件。

span.span: Returns the object that underlies the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷目前的組態`Log`物件。You can use this property to determine the current configuration of the `Log` object. 在用戶端應用程式，`Log`物件是透過`My.Application.Log`物件。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 應用程式，`Log`物件是透過`My.Log`物件。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object. 這是進階的成員;它不會顯示在 IntelliSense 中除非您選取**所有** 索引標籤。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you select the **All** tab. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`TraceSource`屬性。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `TraceSource` property. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |取得每個資訊`Log`物件的記錄檔接聽程式。Get information for each of the `Log` object's log listeners.|[疑難排解：記錄檔接聽程式Troubleshooting: Log Listeners](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/troubleshooting-log-listeners.md)| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|**是****Yes**|

summary.span: 將訊息寫入至應用程式的記錄檔接聽程式。

span.span: Writes a message to the application's log listeners.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteEntry (string message);
.method public instance void WriteEntry(string message) cil managed
Public Sub WriteEntry (message As String)
public: void WriteEntry(System::String ^ message);

param.name: message

span.span: Required.
The message to log.

param.span: 如果 message 為 ，則會使用空字串。

span.span: If message is , an empty string is used.

summary.span: 將訊息寫入至應用程式的記錄檔接聽程式。

span.span: Writes a message to the application's log listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteEntry`方法會將訊息寫入應用程式的事件記錄檔接聽程式。The `WriteEntry` method writes a message to the application's event log listeners. 在用戶端應用程式，`Log`物件是透過`My.Application.Log`物件。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 應用程式，`Log`物件是透過`My.Log`物件。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object. 若要了解哪個記錄檔接聽程式接收`WriteEntry`方法的訊息，請參閱[逐步解說： 判斷其中 My.Application.Log 寫入資訊](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)。To learn which log listeners receive the `WriteEntry` method's messages, see [Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md). 您可以變更預設記錄檔接聽程式。You can change default log listeners. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用應用程式記錄檔](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md)。For more information, see [Working with Application Logs](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md). 對於多載，不接受`id`引數，`id`寫入記錄檔由下表所定義。For overloads that do not take the `id` argument, the `id` written to the log is defined by the following table. |`severity`|預設值 `id`Default `id`| |----------------|------------------| ||00| ||11| ||22| ||33| ||44| ||55| ||66| ||77| ||88| ||99| 下表列出包含工作的範例`WriteEntry`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `WriteEntry` method. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |事件資訊寫入至應用程式的記錄檔接聽程式Write event information to the application's log listeners|[如何：寫入記錄檔訊息How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)| |決定在何處`Log`將資訊寫入Determine where `Log` writes information|[逐步解說：判斷 My.Application.Log 寫入資訊的位置Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用 `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` 方法寫入追蹤資訊。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` method to log tracing information. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 寫入記錄檔訊息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)。For more information, see [How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#11)] 只有在用戶端應用程式內，可以執行這個程式碼範例。This code example can run only within a client application. 變更`My.Application.Log.WriteEntry`至`My.Log.WriteEntry`Web 應用程式。Change `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` to `My.Log.WriteEntry` for Web applications.

exception.span: 具有部分信任的程式碼呼叫方法，但要寫入需要完全信任的事件記錄檔接聽程式 (Listener)。

span.span: Code with partial trust calls the method, but writes to an event log listener that requires full trust.

permission.span: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
Associated enumeration: .

the log is defined by the following table. |`severity`|預設值 `id`Default `id`| |----------------|------------------| ||00| ||11| ||22| ||33| ||44| ||55| ||66| ||77| ||88| ||99| Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md). exception.span: 訊息類型不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The message type is not one of the enumeration values.

exception.span: 具有部分信任的程式碼呼叫方法，但要寫入需要完全信任的事件記錄檔接聽程式 (Listener)。

summary.span: 將例外狀況資訊寫入至應用程式的記錄檔接聽程式。

span.span: Writes exception information to the application's log listeners.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteException (Exception ex);
.method public instance void WriteException(class System.Exception ex) cil managed
Public Sub WriteException (ex As Exception)
public: void WriteException(Exception ^ ex);

span.span: Required.
Exception to log.

summary.span: 將例外狀況資訊寫入至應用程式的記錄檔接聽程式。

span.span: Writes exception information to the application's log listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteException`方法會寫入應用程式的事件記錄檔接聽程式的例外狀況中所包含的資訊。The `WriteException` method writes the information contained in an exception to the application's event log listeners. 在用戶端應用程式，`Log`物件是透過`My.Application.Log`物件。In client applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Application.Log` object. 在 Web 應用程式，`Log`物件是透過`My.Log`物件。In Web applications, the `Log` object is available through the `My.Log` object. 若要了解哪個記錄檔接聽程式接收`WriteException`方法的訊息，請參閱[逐步解說： 判斷其中 My.Application.Log 寫入資訊](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)。To learn which log listeners receive the `WriteException` method's messages, see [Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md). 您可以變更預設記錄檔接聽程式。You can change default log listeners. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用應用程式記錄檔](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md)。For more information, see [Working with Application Logs](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/working-with-application-logs.md). 對於多載，不接受`id`引數，寫入記錄檔的識別碼由下表所定義。For overloads that do not take the `id` argument, the identifier written to the log is defined by the following table. |`severity`|預設值 `id`Default `id`| |----------------|------------------| ||00| ||11| ||22| ||33| ||44| ||55| ||66| ||77| ||88| ||99| 下表列出包含工作的範例`WriteException`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `WriteException` method. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |例外狀況資訊寫入應用程式的事件記錄檔接聽程式。Write exception information to the application's event log listeners.|[如何：記錄例外狀況How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)| |判斷 `Log` 寫入資訊的位置。Determine where `Log` writes information.|[逐步解說：判斷 My.Application.Log 寫入資訊的位置Walkthrough: Determining Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-determining-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用`My.Application.Log.WriteException`方法，以記錄例外狀況。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteException` method to log exceptions. 取消 `Dim` 和 `MsgBox` 行的註解，造成 例外狀況。Uncomment the `Dim` and `MsgBox` lines to cause a exception. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 記錄例外狀況](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)。For more information, see [How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 只有在用戶端應用程式內，可以執行這個程式碼範例。This code example can run only within a client application. 變更`My.Application.Log.WriteException`至`My.Log.WriteException`Web 應用程式。Change `My.Application.Log.WriteException` to `My.Log.WriteException` for Web applications.

Public Sub WriteException (ex As Exception, severity As TraceEventType, additionalInfo As String)
public: void WriteException(Exception ^ ex, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType severity, System::String ^ additionalInfo);
